summary: In 2019, the Office of Management and Budget established 5 key requirements for agencies related to procuring secure, cost-effective cloud services. As of July 2024, the 24 major agencies set policies and guidance that addressed some of these requirements but not others. For example, all the agencies had established guidance to ensure their chief information officer oversees agency modernization efforts. But most hadn't established guidance...
title: Cloud Computing: Agencies Need to Address Key OMB Procurement Requirements
